articles.description: The market seems to be climbing over each worry and most market pundits are touting a big bull phase ahead. Time to be wary?

articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: Deepinder Goyal wins 'Entrepreneur of the Year' award, wife Grecia Munoz gives a shoutout - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Taking to her Instagram stories, the former model-turned-entrepreneur shared a picture of Goyal being handed over the prestigious award by Railway Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw.
articles.content: Zomato CEO Deepinder Goyal was named Entrepreneur of the Year by Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw at the NDTV Indian of the Year Awards. Goyal, 41, was accompanied by his wife Grecia Munoz, who also g… [+1381 chars]
